title: Hairspray in the Park
post_excerpt: You may have heard of Shakespeare in the park—a classic New York offering each summer—but what about Hairspray in the park?...
post_content:
You may have heard of Shakespeare in the park—a classic New York offering each summer—but what about Hairspray in the park? For more than 30 years, the St. Petersburg American Stage has offered outdoor performances of iconic musicals and plays. Between now and May 14, experience Hairspray, a Tony Award-winning musical, under the stars at Demens Landing Park. Ticket range from $22-$30 for general lawn admission, and $38-$40 for reserved chair seating. Bring your blanket and sense of wonder as this iconic performance comes to life!

Tickets: americanstage.org/park/
